name: Explodimals
blurb: Explodimals is a physics-puzzle-platformer out now on Xbox 360. Help bring it to multiple other platforms including iOS and Android!

rewards.reward: Have your name featured in the game's playable credits sequence, so that everyone who gets to the end will see it and know what a great person you are!
Have your name feature in the game's playable credits sequence and receive a copy of the game for any one of the platforms it is released on, two weeks before release.
Have your name feature in the game's playable credits sequence and receive a copy of the game for each of the platforms it is released on, two weeks before release.

Receive a special preview version of the explodimals character creation tool (Windows, Mac or Linux) and create your own explodimal out of the pre-existing parts to have printed on a tshirt! (The Xbox 360 version features over 180 parts, the final version will feature many more).\r\n\r\nHave your name feature in the game's playable credits sequence and receive a copy of the game for each of the platforms it is released on, two weeks before release.

Design your own explodimal character that will feature in the game!

It could be your own face, a loved one or a pet, or a drawing of anything you can imagine (obviously nothing likely to cause offense or infringe anyone else's copyright will be allowed).

You will also receive an artist credit in the game's playable credits sequence and receive a copy of the game for each of the platforms it is released on, two weeks before release.

Design your own explodimal character that will feature in the game and receive a custom t-shirt with your own explodimal on it!

It could be a photograph of your own face, a loved one or a pet, or a drawing of anything you can imagine (obviously nothing likely to cause offense or infringe anyone else's copyright will be allowed).

You will also receive an artist credit in the game's playable credits sequence and receive a copy of the game for each of the platforms it is released on, two weeks before release.

Receive a special preview version of the game's level editor (Windows, Mac or Linux) a few months before the game's release and use it to design a level that will feature in the finished game!

Your level must be playable and not break the game, and mustn't contain anything offensive or copyright-infringing, but otherwise anything goes!

You will also receive a level designer credit in the game's playable credits sequence and receive a copy of the game for each of the platforms it is released on, two weeks before release.

All of the above!  Design a level, design an explodimal character, get a t-shirt featuring your design, get a copy of the game on each platform two weeks before release, and get credited as both an artist and a level designer!

Executive Producer! Have your name feature right at the start of the game's playable credits sequence BEFORE everyone else's (even mine!) and TWICE THE SIZE to make sure everyone who plays it sees your name and knows what a great person you are!\r\n\r\nYou'll also get to design a level, design an explodimal character, get a t-shirt featuring your design and get a copy of the game on each platform THREE weeks before release, so you'll get to play it before anyone else!
